title: Wellness Brands Aman Resorts, Como Shambhala, and More Share Their Recipes for Immunity-Boosting Drinks

description: From refreshing juice blends to soothing teas, here are 6 immunity-boosting drinks you can make at home, from wellness brands Aman, Anantara, Como, Chiva-Som, and Sangha Retreat by Octave Institute.
